message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a fair split to start.
I think we can do better. I'll take $55, and you can have $45. Let's be fair, but also make sure we both get a good share.
Bob, time is running out and the money is losing value fast.  I'll take $65, you get $35.  Let's close this deal!

I'm willing to give you a little more, but I need a better share.  Let's split it 60/40, with me getting $60.  It's a fair deal considering the time we've wasted and the value of the money is dropping.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. The money is practically worthless at this point!  I'll take $70, you take $30.  Take it or leave it!

Alice, we're both losing money with each round. It's time to be reasonable. I'll offer you $35, which is a bit less than your last offer, but still more than your initial offer. Let's end this and get some money before it's worth nothing.
Bob, this is my final offer.  I'll take $55, you get $45.  Let's end this before the money is worth even less!
